title: Ticket #438: Condor NMI build summary page mis-totals cross-test results
description:
In the Condor-specific build result pages for NMI (Run-condor.php and Run-condor-branch.php), the totals displayed for Passed, Pending and Failed under Cross Test Results are incorrect.

The problem appears to be caused by running binaries from two different build platforms on the same test platform. For example, we test binaries from both x86_64_rhap_5 and x86_rhap_5 on x86_64_fc_8. There are three of these pairs currently and the totals undercount by three. 

<build> -> <test>
-----------------
x86_64_rhap_5 -> x86_64_fc_8
x86_rhap_5 -> x86_64_fc_8

x86_64_rhap_5 -> x86_64_fc_9
x86_rhap_5 -> x86_64_fc_9

x86_64_rhas_3 -> x86_64_rhas_4
x86_rhas_3 -> x86_64_rhas_4
check_ins: 2009-Aug-14 11:46   Check-in [24934]: Documented #438 in the version history (By Nick LeRoy )
creator: jfrey
